name: Conseil Européen de Remanufacture
memberOrga: We are growing our membership after launching in Brussels in January 2017. Our membership list as of 1st March 2019 is; Articona, German Imaging Technologies Dubai LLC, PSS, Lexmark International Inc, IBM, SKF, Volvo Car Group, Autocraft Drivechain Solutions Ltd, Panalpina Management Ltd, syncreon, APD International, Aspire Engineering, Michelin, Hetzel GmbH, Wilson Power Solutions, Lizarte S.A. A W Europe/ AWTC Europe,  ALEC GmbH, Teleplan. Trade Association members are:  COCIR, ETIRA, FIRM, AFRA, ETRMA. Partnership memebers are: RAI (for ReMaTec) International Cooperation members are: CACE (China) Heijan City Government (China) Automotive Trade Association China.
goal: The promotion of remanufacturing as an essential element of the circular economy and industrial strategy. We aim to grow remanufacturing sales by organisations based in Europe to €100 billion by 2030.
interests: Climate Action, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives: Circular Economy, Trade, External Relations, Product Policy and Design, industrial and economic growth.
